subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets commemorated the 20th anniversary of their 1986 World Series title with an on-field reunion. But that was just an appetizer. The main course was a come-from-behind win.
snippet: The Mets commemorated the 20th anniversary of their 1986 World Series title with an on-field reunion. But that was just an appetizer. The main course was a come-from-behind win.
